channel.title: One Minute How-To
channel.description: The One Minute How-To is your podcast. Each episode features someone just like you who explains how to do something. The catch is that the participant is only given 60 seconds. This means that they need to get right to the point, but isn't that a good thing?
channel.copyright: This feed is protected by an Attribution Non-commercial No Derivatives Creative Commons license.

item.title: Item #550 - How To Launch A Successful Digital Marketing Campaign
item.description:
Tod Maffin explains the seven steps in getting a digital marketing campaign right.

This is the last One Minute How-To show. Thanks so much for listening!
item.author: George.Smyth@Gmail.com (George L Smyth)
